nandun kalamanakaranaya pilibanda upadhiyak laba dan nawasilanthaye sewaya karanawa. 1985 di upan eranga putha dan landan metropolitanhi mrudukanga injineru kalamanakaruwaku lesa katayuthu karanawa.paripalana sewa wibhage samath wu gunasena 1980 di hambanthota kachcheriye mulasthana upa disapathi lesa puhunuwa labuwa. 1982 - 84 wasarawala kolambaa gamanagamana mandala amathyanshaye sahakara lekam lesa katayuthu kala ethuma 1984 niwasa departhamenthuwe sahakara lekam dhurayata path wuna. 1986 sita 89 dakwa palath palana niwasa ha idikirim amathyanshaye sahakara lekamwaraya lesa pathwa giya ohu hitapu janadhipathi pe්ramadasa mahaththaya ekka wada karapu kale jiwithe boho dewal igena gaththu kalayak lesa ohu dakinawa.1989 - 94 dakwa janadhipathi karyalaye janadhipathi sahakara lekamwaraya lesa katayuthu kala ee mahatha jayawardhanapura rohal katayuthu pilibanda pathkarana lada janadhipathi komisame lekamwaraya lesath 1991 di wawniyawe iranayihi athiwu siddhi pilibanda komisame lekamwaraya lesath katayuthu kala.janadhipathi jangama sewa sambandhikaraka kamitu niladhariyaku lesa sewaya kala kalayedi merata dilidu janathawata saba mehewarak itu karannata awasthawa labima gana ethuma sathutu wenawa. 1995 - 2000 marga sanwardhana adhikariye idam athpath karaganime niladhariya lesath kolambaa athireka disapathi lesath katayuthu kala.2004 di rajaye sewayen wishrama labu ee mahatha ee wasarema agosthu masaye patan basnahira palathe idam komasariswaraya lesa katayuthu arambauwa. 2008 patan basnahira palath marga sanwardhana adhikariye idam adhyaksha lesa pathwuna. 2010 sita aapada kalamanakarana adhikariye idam upadeshaka lesa katayuthu karanawa.thama upan game pihituwana lada imaduwa padaname sabhapathiwaraya lesa thama menma uthsahayen igenima labana daksha daruwange adhyapanaya nanga situwannata shishyathwa laba denawa.
